explains: n. 工匠，手艺人；技艺能人（尤指男性）；（英国）皇家电气和机械工程兵部队技工

sentences.en: He was a craftsman in metalwork from Dresden.
sentences.cn: 他是来自德累斯顿的金工工匠。

sentences.en: The table in the kitchen was made by a local craftsman.
sentences.cn: 厨房里的桌子是当地一名工匠做的。

sentences.en: The cut of a diamond depends on the skill of its craftsman.
sentences.cn: 切割钻石的好坏取决于工匠的技艺。
